: : Darkangel : :

Darkangel manuvered himself near Dreadplague, his voice low.

Darkangel: I wouldn't call it being stuck together.

He smiles at her.

> Tyrael: As I said, it's your project. Dreadplague, please assist 
him.

can

light),
